message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $110. I believe it offers excellent value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate it. I am willing to pay $95 for the product.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your position, but I'm looking for something closer to $105. This product is truly worth it, and I'm confident you'll find great value in it.
I appreciate your response, Alice. Considering the value of the product, I would like to offer $100 for it.
